title: Koko Jidai ni Gomandatta Jou sama to no Dousei Seikatsu wa Igaito Igokochi ga Warukunai
description:
A romantic comedy about living together with a scarred "Queen" in a relationship thatâ€™s more than friends but less than lovers!!

One late night, Yamamoto, a college student working part-time at a convenience store, reunites with Hayashi Megumi, his high school classmate and the most beautiful girl in their class. Known as the "Queen" for her strong-willed and arrogant personality, Yamamoto had always found her difficult to get along with. However, during a routine conversation, he notices painful bruises on her wrist. After learning that her boyfriend had been abusing her, Yamamoto decides to let Hayashi stay at his place...!?
author: Dozaemon Misoneta
